alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 4:09PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Palm Beach County through 445 PM EST... At 409 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Village Of Golf, or near Boynton Beach, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Lake Worth, Ocean Ridge, Lantana, Atlantis, Village Of Golf, Kings Point, Dunes Road, Hypoluxo, Gulf Stream, Briny Breezes, Manalapan, Aberdeen, Aberdeen Golf Course, Morikami Park, Seminole Manor, Villages Of Oriole and Lake Worth Corridor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
